  3  --BECAUSE IT IS AVARIABLE AND IT CAN STORE ONLY VALUE SO USE THE WHERE CLAUSE WITH THE PRIMARY KEY VALUES
  4  V_ENAME VARCHR2(30);
  5  V_SAL NUMBER(10,2);
  6  BEGIN
  7  SELECT ENAME,SAL
  8  INTO V_ENAME,V_SAL
  9  FROM EMP
 10  WHERE EMPNO=7788;
